text: Great compilation of design tools. I still wish we could build more things like this. <https://medium.com/web-design-technique/designing-design-tools-7d014f22a947>

attachments.title: Designing design tools
attachments.text: Designers are building tools to help them explore, prototype and be more creative.

text: cc: <@U02AUNA0P> who was asking about this very thing
for what it's worth, I downloaded both Origami and Avocado yesterday (built on top of QuartzComposer). I've yet to dig in, but the demos seem quite promising.
Good. I'm planning on giving both a go later this week.
i just need to set some time aside to understand QC
from there, i believe it'll be relatively smooth sailing
